sentences.english: Hand in hand with reading, he has developed the habit of making notes.
sentences.chinese: 他養成了一邊讀書一邊作筆記的習慣。

sentences.english: We are taking notes in our English class.
sentences.chinese: 我們在英語課堂上作筆記。

sentences.english: I find it necessary to take down notes while listening. 20. It is time since…
sentences.chinese: 我覺得作聽力時有必要作筆記。

sentences.english: I find it necessary to take down notes while listening.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得作聽力時有必要作筆記。

sentences.english: For example, the technique of interviewing requires the skills of note-taking and active listening.
sentences.chinese: 例如，訪談技術需要作筆記和主動傾聽的技巧。

sentences.english: Some students didn't like to take notes.
One of the best ways of absorbing knowledge is to make notes in the margin while you are reading.
sentences.chinese: 獲取知識的最佳途徑之一是讀書時在頁邊作筆記。

sentences.english: When I took notes, I left every other line on my notepaper blank.
sentences.chinese: 我作筆記時是隔一行寫一行。

sentences.english: Read, take notes, jot down ideas, develop a thesis.
sentences.chinese: 閱讀，作筆記，記下想法，寫總結。

sentences.english: It is helpful for us to take notes in class.
sentences.chinese: 對我們來說，在課上作筆記很有幫助。

sentences.english: Notes should be made whenever we study any book.
sentences.chinese: 無論學習什麼，我們都要作筆記。

sentences.english: I need to take down notes for the class.
sentences.chinese: 我必須爲同學們作筆記。
